publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3816 Tommy Sheridan: Boycott Coca-Colaâ€”That the Parliament notes the growing campaign to boycott Coca-Cola based on serious claims of violence, including murder, against employees in bottling plants in Colombia and environmental destruction in villages surrounding its facilities in India; notes that universities like Oxford in England and New York and Michigan in the United States of America have voted to boycott Coca-Cola, and calls on the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body to organise a boycott of Coca-Cola within the Parliament in solidarity with trade unionists in Colombia and India.
S2M-3816 Boycott Coca-Cola (lodged on 13 January 2006) Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*
